name: CARBAPENEMASE_TESTS
description: This table stores carbapenemase tests performed for an NHSN LabID sample.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CARBA_TEST_C_NAME
columns.description: The carbapenemase test category ID for the NHSN LabID Event registry record.
entries: Polymerase chain reaction - Klebsiella pneumoniae carbapenemase
Polymerase chain reaction - New Delhi metallo-beta-lactamase
Polymerase chain reaction - Verona Integron-encoded metallo-beta-lactamase
